00017 enum DictionaryIteratorType {
00018     KEYS,
00019     VALUES,
00020     ENTRIES
00021 };
00022 
00023 template<class T, class Key, class Value>
00024 class DictionaryIterator : public virtual Iterator<T> {
00025 public:
00026     explicit DictionaryIterator(Dictionary<Key,Value> & _dict,
00027             DictionaryIteratorType _type) : dict(_dict), type(_type),
00028             idx(_dict.buckets->length), count(dict.size) {}
00029     virtual ~DictionaryIterator() {}
00030 
00031     bool hasNext() const;
00032     const T & next() const;
00033     bool hasPrevious() const;
00034     const T & previous() const;
00035     std::size_t nextIndex() const;
00036     std::size_t previousIndex() const;
00037 private:
00038     Dictionary * dict;
00039     DictionaryIteratorType type;
00040     DictionaryEntry<Key,Value> * last = NULL;
00041     DictionaryEntry<Key,Value> * next = NULL;
00042     std::size_t idx;
00043     std::size_t count;
00044 
00045 };
00046 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE(Core)
